title: Determine Need for Entity Change
description: A growing sole proprietorship is considering changing its business structure (e.g., to an LLC or S-Corp) for liability protection and tax reasons.

tasks.description: Discuss the owner's goals regarding liability, taxes, and administrative complexity.
Explain the tax and legal characteristics of different business entities (LLC, S-Corp, C-Corp).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly outlines the pros and cons of each structure.

tasks.description: Provide a recommendation for the most suitable business structure based on the client's specific situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends forming an LLC and making an S-Corp tax election.
